text: Press Start to begin

options.text: Start!

text: It's a gorgeous day in Springfield, how would like to start your day?

options.text: Forget your pants and run to Work before Mr.Burns finds out your late again
Run down to the Kwik-E-Mart and get some goodies

text: You made it to work without Mr.Burns finding out

options.text: You meet your new co-worker Frank Grimes
You decide you've worked hard enough and decide to head to Moe's

text: Frank Grimes has told you he is not your friend and wants nothing to do with you

options.text: You wallow and decide to invite him over to dinner to make amends
You go to Moe's to drink away your frustrations

text: After hosting Frank Grimes, things only get worse and you decide to show him by winning the design contest at work

options.text: You win but Grimey goes nuts
You celebrate by taking the family to Itchy and Scratchyland

text: After witnessing Grimey go nuts you decide to:

options.text: Go to Moe's

text: Your at Moe's :

options.text: You tell him about your day and he drowns your sorrows in Duff beer
You soak up the latest gossip for your blog

text: Just like that your day is over...

options.text: Tomorrow is another day in Springfield

text: You walk into the Kwik-E-Mart:

options.text: You find Apu in the arms of another woman and leave quickly
You order the most syrupy Squishee, he can make

text: You walk home in silence, unable to believe what you saw

options.text: You decide to go back in bed, because today has already been too much
You decide to sell your soul to the devil to forget what you saw and get your snacks

text: Home sweet home!

options.text: Ahh this is the life

text: The devil warns you that once you eat the last bite your soul is his...

options.text: You decide not to eat the last piece to keep your soul
You eat the last bite

text: Your smarter than the Devil!

options.text: Woo-Hoo!

text: The Devil takes you to hell

options.text: You accept your fate and your punishment
Marge will fight for you and get you back

text: Hell isn't so bad afterall

options.text: These donuts won't eat themselves

text: Marge saves you, you really are soul mates

options.text: Alls well that ends well

text: You drink the entire Squishee, what do you do next?

options.text: You hit the town Broadway style!
Embrace the fox and go for a spiritual adventure

text: You wake up from your sugar high in bed, wearing a Junior Campers uniform

options.text: You pretend it never happened and go back to sleep
You make Homer go with you, what's the worst that can happen?

text: The fox takes you on an Adventure, do you want to wake up?

options.text: Yes, please!
No, let's see where this takes us!

text: You go on your first trip with the Junior Campers and get stranded on a raft. Do you:

options.text: Trust Homer to get you out of this
Stand by Flanders to get you through

text: You go on the adventure with the fox

options.text: This is weird even for you

text: Homer ate the last of your rations... and you throw him off the raft

options.text: Ask Flanders what to do next?

text: Flanders is the man! He uses his wit and his prayer to get you through this and you live to see another day!

options.text: Time to go home

text: You get caught spilling the dirt on all your friends

options.text: You get tossed out on your behind and go home to mope
